properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm; S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 16 at 3:17AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas
6 to 11 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Duck to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST FRIDAY
